text:
.@Science: Words of wisdom: "A #virus that cannot transmit and infect others has no chance to mutate."
1. Wear a face mask.
2. Wash your hands.
3. Watch your physical distance.
4. Accept the #vaccine 
#SARSCoV2 #COVID19 #NIH_CEAL #coronavirus #COVID_19 https://t.co/R8kWSCCjjm https://t.co/YqVyagf6fr
